entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • #next #33831
  • build.cmd the dotnet/sdk Something went wrong #33819

PullRequests

Created

  • Unblock sln add for a shared project #33837
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Merged

  • Replace ellipsis character with 3-dots #33814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix printed version for APICompat.Tool and GenAPI.Tool #33619
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #33572
    Area-Infrastructure, source-build, untriaged

Updated

  • Update param in CoreGenerateSatelliteAssemblies #24514
    Area-ILLink
  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console, Area-Watch
  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move wait and result calls to the thread pool to avoid deadlocks. #33586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Containers: fix some auth issues. #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers
